Galaxy S5+ G901F


Back

Unlock:


Unlock devices with either Z3X or Chimera tool
Flash of engineering modem before unlock

To flash engineering modem:

  1. Boot device in download mode by holding Vol- Home & Power
  2. Connect device to PC via USB
  3. Open Odin and select the CP box
  4. Select D:/Samsung/Engineering_Modem/G901F_Eng_Modem.tar
  5. Press Start to flash


To Unlock:

NOTE: While engineering modem is flashed it is common for the device to display IMEI: 0 this is normal and the imei will be restored upon flashing of the original modem after unlocking.

  1. Open VHUI.exe and connect to Z3X box
  2. Open Z3X SamsungTool Pro from Start Menu
  3. Select G901F from the model selection menu
  4. Select the Unlock tab at the top of the window
  5. Boot the phone and skip through all startup menus
  6. Open the dialler and enter *#0808# Video
  7. Select DM+MODEM+ADB and connect phone to PC
  8. In the Port section at the top of the window select Samsung Modem port Video
  9. Press the unlock button (if the process fails try again)
  10. Once unlocked Flash device with full firmware to restore original modem

Debrand:


No generic UK version of this device exists, nearest available flash is EVR (EE UK)

Demo Remove:


Check unit has a valid IMEI, many Samsung demo units do not have an IMEI
To remove demo from device flash with 4 file engineering firmware package

Factory Reset Protection (FRP) & Samsung Account:
